113.content:
"Aaah, this is just what I needed..." Amy said in her shower. She scrubbed her body with a pink loofah, scrubbing all parts of her body. She just wanted to get a nice relaxing shower before bed so she could be ready for anything that the world through at her the next day! After scrubbing her body down, she rinsed herself off and (after slipping and falling on her cute butt!) she turned off the water and began to dry off. She wrapped one towel around her head to dry her quills down, used another to dry off her body, and a third one to wrap around her naked body. Poor Amy was incredibly modest when it came to her body. Since she didn't own a bathrobe, she often walked around barefoot and in a towel to ensure that she wouldn't be walking around exposed for anyone to see!

Amy walked into her room, opening drawers to find her clothing when...well...that's what was missing. Clothes. She checked each drawer in her room, each one with more panic building up inside her. She checked her closet, empty. She checked her laundry, empty. She checked her shoe rack, empty. Sock drawer, empty. Underwear drawer, empty. She had NO clothes throughout her whole home!

"W-what?? This can't be happening, where are my clothes? I literally had them in here this morning! My shoes were at the front door, my panties were here, my dress was here...there's nothing here! I can't walk around naked! I live in an apartment! I can't just walk to go get more clothes! And if I go out in a towel, people will take it no doubt! This is so embarrassing already...no shoes, no dress, nothing!!!"Amy said to herself with a slight whine in her voice...

13.content:
Blaze had just finished her cup of coffee and threw the cup in the nearby trash can. "Oops." She said as she missed the can. She went over to pick up the cup and put it in the trash. Rouge the Bat had just witnessed this from the sky. She knew about Blaze, but never met her personally. Until today where she got a mischievous idea. She swooped down near Blaze and introduced her self.

"Hey! You must be Blaze, right?" She asked her. "The inter-dimensional princess?"

"Uh... Yes, that's me." Blaze answered. "Do I know you?"

"Not until now, Rouge the Bat." She greeted as they shook hands. "Say, I couldn't help but notice you were littering just now. Am I right?"

"No. I just missed the trash can, that's all." Blaze said.

"Ah. That's a relief. If that were me, I could've been in a lot trouble." Rouge said. "But you, on the other hand, would've gotten off scott-free."

"What do you mean?" Blaze asks.

"You don't know? I'm saying you, specifically, have complete immunity from the law in this dimension." Rouge explained. "You see, anybody not from this world is free to do anything they want without any form of diplomacy to stop them."

"Is this true?" Blaze asks.

"You tell me. Did you see any cops around when you accidentally threw your coffee cup on the ground?" Rouge asked her.

"...No?" Blaze answers.

"Exactly, sister! You're from another dimension. That means you're free to do whatever you want in our world without getting in trouble." Rouge persuaded Blaze. "Sometimes, I envy the lucky." She sighed.

Blaze was dumbfounded by Rouge's words. She had no idea if what Rouge was saying is true or not. Her royal upbringing prevented her from being a free spirit and, as such, she has respected and honored that code throughout her whole life. Then again, if what Rouge is saying is true, there could've been no way for Blaze pass up this golden opportunity to experience freedom.

What is her response?
13.title: Blazing Streak

131.content:
"I guess I never thought of it like that." Blaze admitted.

"Of course." Rouge agreed. "This world is you're oyster."

"You know what? You've convinced me!" Blaze tells her.

"Atta girl! I knew you'd see the light." Rouge patted Blaze on the back. "Hey! I have an idea to help you out. Are you at all fond of the clothes you're wearing?" She asks.

"Um, I mean, I guess they're uncomfortable sometimes." Blaze admitted.

"If you feel that way, just take'em off." Rouge suggested. "Walk around butt-naked if you want!"

"Wait, what?!" Blaze jumped.

"It's like I said, you'll never be in trouble for doing so." Rouge reassured her.

"R- Right. It just feels embarrassing to even think about." Blaze says.

"You never know until you try." Rouge dared her.

After a moment of hesitation, Blaze gave in to Rouge's words. She took off all of her clothes in view of the public. Not that anyone was passing by, she was just taken aback by what she was doing right now. Within seconds, Blaze was now completely clad in nothing but her fur. She never thought she would be this brave to get naked in front of a stranger she just met. Her heart was beating like it was running a marathon, and her cheeks were as red as a tomato.

"So, how do you feel?" Rouge asked with a sly grin.
131.title: She Believes Her

132.content:
"Right." Blaze says. "You really think I don't have any common sense to not believe you? Unless you can find some proof, I bid you a good day."

Blaze walks away leaving Rouge miffed that her plan had failed. "Aw, shoot!" She snapped her fingers. "I'll get her next time, though."

Sorry for wasting you're time with this chapter.

155332212.content:
What started as a struck of luck, ended as an unfortunate event.
Amy had won a contest, it's prize? A whole free week in the penthouse a fancy hotel, she was allowed to bring two friends with here and the lucky (soon unlucky) girls where Blaze the Cat and Tikal the Echidna.

It all began some time after their arrival, the girls decided to take a walk on the beach, eventually they made it to an empty area a bit far from the hotel. Amy suggested to sunbathe……topless.

It took a bit of persuasion to convince Tikal and Blaze (especially Blaze) to accept, but they eventually joined in, the three girls removed their bikini tops and laid down on the sand. After some minutes....

"Hey girls.." said Tikal "Where are our tops?!“

Amy and Blaze rose up and looked around, their bikini tops were missing.
Blaze shouted and covered her chest "Hey, what's going on?! its this some sort of prank, Amy?"
"Look!" Amy pointed towards the sea, their bikini tops where floating on the water "Quick!" shouted the hedgehog girl, the three girls entered the water in an attempt to get their missing tops back but the waves where stronger than they expected, despite their efforts the girls lost track of the clothes.

The trio got out of the water, each one covering their chest.
"Sorry girls, I didn't expect this to happen" said Amy.
"The worst part is that we forgot to bring towels" added Blaze.
"Umm..." Tikal interrupted "I don't think that's the worst part, don't you feel a breeze....down?"
The three girls slowly looked down only to discover they were completely naked, they quickly looked to the sea only to see their bikini bottoms going away into open sea.
The girls scream and cover themselves.
"This can't be happening! This can't be happening" cried Blaze.
"What do we do now?" shouted Tikal.
Amy looked around and saw something shinny on the sand and picked it up
"Good news, the room key is still here" Amy announced "If we are careful we can snea-"
Blaze Interrupted "Are you crazy?! the hotel is full of people, we'll be seen no doubt"
After a pause Amy discussed "Well there is another thing we can do"


"What is it?" Asked Tikal
Amy pointed towards a mountain "See that mountain? Tails has a garage there. If we go through that forest over there we can reach it and we're less likely to be seen".
"Tails is the type of person who would help us without asking questions" agreed Blaze.
"However it'll probably take us a whole day to get there" continued Amy.
"So..." Tikal said "Our two options are, trying to go through the hotel, it would be a shorter distance but the chances of being seen are high, or going through the forest, however will take us a while to get to the end, though it makes us less likely to be seen like this"

What decision do the girls take?

The girls started walking up the forest when...
"Hey?" asked Blaze "Do you hear that?"
All the other girls paused and paid attention to their surroundings, the faint sound of something soaring was heard.
"Is that a machine?" asked Rouge.
"An airplane maybe?" said Amy.
"It's a robot" suggested sticks.
"Girls run!" shouted Blaze "Whatever that thing is, it's coming right here!"
As the sound's volume increased, the girls jumped out of the way just in time, a blurry figure came out of the bushes passing through the spot they were just a second ago.
"What was that?!" asked Amy.
The next thing they heard was the splash on the pond, whatever that was it had fallen in the water.
"Should we check what it is?" suggested Amy.
"I say we should run" replied Rouge.
"But, What if that was someone? " said a concerned Tikal “They could need help"
The girls..
1553322122211212111.title: She woke them up with no problem.

15533221222112121112.content:
Slowly but surely, the group started nearing the pond. As they were getting closer Amy noticed a silhouette swimming towards the surface.
"They're coming out" Amy said.
Sticks pointed towards the shore.
"Hey what's that?" asked the Badger.
Amy looked towards the object sticks was pointing at, it looked like a skateboard but it was floating a bit above the ground.
"That thing looks familiar" whispered Amy.
At that moment, Wave the swallow came out of the water, Amy gasped before covering her mouth.
Wave started coughing and tried to catch her breath.
"Let's get out of here" whispered Amy to the rest of the group, but as soon as the girls turned around to leave...
"Hi Amy" said Wave "I heard you shout"
"H-h-hey Wave" said Amy in response "What are you doing here?"
Amy and the others nervously turned around. They noticed that Wave wasn't looking at them, she was focused on the extreme gear on the shore.
"I was testing some upgrades I gave to this thing" said Wave as she was inspecting said thing "But I see now that there's still some things I have to do about the turbo mode"
Amy realized that Wave was too distracted with the gear to pay attention to the naked group of girls, an idea came to her.
"That's very interesting" commented the hedgehog "What kind of upgrades did you give to that thing?"
Wave, who hasn't stopped looking at her vehicle chuckled.
"Well if you must know" the swallow started explaining "I started with-"
"Girls" whispered Amy towards the others "Lets leave, while she's distracted."
While Wave was lost in her speech, the other girls started leaving the area.
Then.
15533221222112121112.title: Check the pond.

choices: They reached the base of a mountain.
155332212221121211122.content:
The girls didn't even manage to take two steps before Sticks tripped causing a domino effect on the group which ended with all of them on the ground.
"Careful Sticks" whispered Blaze.
"Sorry" replied Sticks "I was listening to Wave"
"Sticks you surprise me sometimes" said Amy, before noticing that Wave was standing right behind her.
"So....Amy" commented Wave "Why didn't you tell me you weren't alone"
Amy opened her mouth to speak.
"Also" added Wave "I see a lot of skin but no clothes"
"You'll see.. um..." stuttered Amy "You hit yourself in the head and this is all a dream"
Wave didn't reply, she just raised an eyebrow.
"We are guides of the dream world" added Sticks "We'll guide you through your subconscious journey"
"You all have gone insane" said Wave in a deadpan tone.
"Alright" said Amy before explaining what happened to Wave. From the incident at the hotel, Sticks' crazy plan, and Rouge's misfortune with a tree.
"And that's what happened" explained Amy.
"You should have gone to the hotel" said Wave.
"I'm starting to think we should have" commented Blaze.
"Hey Wave, I think you could help us" suggested Tikal "The key we hid, you could use it to get us some clothes and with that gear of yours it will be quick“
"Oh yeah.....no" responded Wave "Sorry girls but as you can see I have a lot of work to do"
"Just say your price" complained Rouge "I know you only want something to gain"
"Seems like I wasn't able to fool you" Wave Chuckled "So what do you have in mind?"
"Wave" said Tikal "You help us and you'll get my spot at the hotel, think about it, five days in one of the most luxurious rooms on the world, all the fancy food and great pools"
"Tempting" said Wave "Throw in some extra bucks and it's a deal, the equipment I use isn't cheap"
"Okay fine" responded Amy "But you'll have to help us first"
After Amy told Wave the location of the key and other information needed the swallow hopped into her vehicle.
"Just wait here" announced Wave "I'll be back in no time"
"I'm just glad this will be over" commented Blaze.
"Tell me about it" added Amy.
"Nothing will go wrong from now on!" shouted Sticks, Blaze frowned in response.
"You just had to say that!" yelled Blaze.
"What?" responded Sticks "What did I sa-"
An explosion was heard as a flash lightened the area, all the girls closed their eyes.
Once they opened their eyes they saw a cloud of black smoke in front of them.
"Wave?" asked Amy "You okay?"
As the smoke cleared, the girls saw a dazed Wave still in one piece.......of clothing, the explosion had reduced all of her clothes except for her head bandanna, into ashes.
Once Wave snapped out of the dizziness she picked out the remains of her ride.
"Figures" said Wave in frustration "Guess I can't help you now"
"Alright, Who's going to tell her?" said Blaze.
"Tell me what?" said Wave before looking down, as the realization came in, she covered and shouted "Are you kidding me?!"
"Look on the bright side" suggested Amy "You still got your bandanna"
Wave glared at her.
"Just come with us" responded Amy "We are just wasting time"
Without other options, Wave decided to join the nudist group.
As the growing team continued walking....
155332212221121211122.title: The plan goes wrong.

info.brief_description: Sonic Girls find themselves in a "reveling" situation.
info.description:
This is Sonic Girls ENF, but with the allowance of sexual content. Here are da rules for that...

Notice: I've kinda abandoned this story, so be aware of the declining quality in the entries are because I'm kinda done moderating this. I'm surprised people still write on this to be perfectly honest. While I am flattered, I do not quite enjoy the quality or content that has been added. Read at your own risk.

Consensual only, rape will keep this from being able to be publicly listed
Cream the Rabbit is not eligible to participate in any sexual activity
No scat or vore

And remember:
Nudity is defined as the absence of any clothes, even shoes and gloves. However, jewelry and head wear is allowed to remain.
Any post with poor grammar will be edited. Any post violating the content rules will be deleted with extreme prejudice!
